sentences.sentence: In addition, we proceed to the data synchronism and butt jointing in nighttime.

sentences.sentence: All synchronism belts driving are structure simple, noise lower, running steady and vibrate lower.

sentences.sentence: Once trated, they may continue to grow causing groups of generators to lose synchronism or even islanding.
